content: Cult classic with great art style, full gamepad support, and unforgiving gameplay. This is gonna take a while..

The graphics are great. You can resize the control pad and action buttons, in addition to repositioning them, but somehow this does not fix the issues with slow response. I wasn't able to jump and hit the first level boss even on the easy level. My character couldn't jump high enough at the right moment to do any damage. No matter what I did, it's health stayed at 100%
Run on P30 pro with PG9083S bluetooth controller. First, the game is not full screen. It also crashes at start sometime. I like the graphics. It's pretty good when it's not crashing.

The game could have been great, graphics is awesome but the controls are terrible, the difficulty is ridiculous even when easy is chosen. Really a pity, be aware its money thrown away. Frustrating with really little fun at all.

The game could have been great, graphics is awesome but the controls are terrible, the difficulty is ridiculous even when easy is chosen. Really a pity, be aware its money thrown away. Frustrating with really little fun at all.

Bought on phone, won't recognize tge purchase on android tv
Excellent, very well made

hello and welcome to this detailed review of wonderboy the dragons trap which is a remake of the master system version way back in the 1990,s which was 8 bit game, this has been updated with new graphics and sound and remastered, which it plays the same as the original version, im playing this on my android phone as was on offer . The game play and levels , being updated , play the same as it did before and the remastered version is wonderfully reproduced with modern visuals, its a great game and will spend hours playing it to find all those areas, my only concern is the controls being a bit laggy or not 100% correct, this is when trying to do jump attacks or jumping to platforms. on a android it can be a bit hard to pull off. would have been nice if they added more areas to find and expanded the original as its a bit short. overal a great game , and would recomend. 4/5
An absolutely wonderful experience and with a soundtrack so addicting i got it on vinyl.
Absolutely awesome port and remake!!! I have had no issues and controls work well but i use a controller now and it works flawlessly!!
Very fun game and great remake .I am loving it
Yes, please and thank you! Love this series and worth every penny! Please continue to bring ports like this üôè ‚ù§
Wow Amazing Game

A revised review of the game. Overall it's an okay port, but there are a myriad of issues, as listed from experience here: The title screen is an amalgamation between the Wonder Boy and Girl variants. Occasionally attack or spell buttons fail to work. The Tasmanian Sword can glitch and no longer allow you to switch forms. Mouse-Man's hidden challenge area for his charmstone bugs the control pad during the high platforming bit, making him veer off to the right and back down to the bottom.
Just brilliant! Play on my shield pro with an Xbox360 controller but fine on the phone. Such a cool revamp, cycle live into retro music/graphics never gets old. Great stuff guys.

The best game for Sega Master System. The new artwork and music is amazing. Controller support works great. It's awesome how I can switch from the retro version to the modern version with the touch of a button. I absolutely love this! Thank you for remaking this game and I hope to see more remakes in the future.

The graphics and music are great but when I try to play it the character will barely move (the game characters movement is frozen and very slow motion). I have a lenovo tablet 10 and tried downloading the game multiple times but to no avail since the problem persists. I want my money back. Such a shame for what appeared to be an excellent game.
Actually better then expected. I thought I would get bored fast as the gameplay is old. Played for longer then I expected
This game is absolutely amazing.
Unfortunately it does not recognize the BT xbox pad I plugged to my Nvidia Shield TV that otherwise work with other games. Shame.
Fantastic remake of the original with option to switch between old style and new style sprites.

Amazing game, but 2 issues. On a 2019 Amazon Fire HD 10 the sound is crackling, and every 30 min or so the game freezes and i have to either exit app or restart device. Havent tested on my snwp dragon 835 or 855 phones yet. Wish it would work on this tablet. it is the perfect size to enjoy with a xbox s gamepad. The xbox s controller works perfectly with no lag!
One of my favorite childhood games!
Great game especially if you were a fan of the original.
Relive the classic
Absolutely amazing proper old skool

Thank you very much for your kind words. We really appreciate! 

Have a good day,

content: Best retro game! Graphics are awesome, gameplay is good. If your a big fan of the old classic games, this is one if them. Hoping if you can bring back and remaster alex the kidd miracle world and shinobi.
replyContent:
Hello Jimmy, 

Thank you very much for your kind words. Bring back Alex Kidd Miracle World and Shinobi would be such a great achievement. Let's keep our fingers crossed for the future!

content: There is a problem with the All the sound on general, hope you guys fix it! PLEASE
replyContent:
Hello, 

We're deeply sorry to hear that you're encountering an issue with the sound on Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap.

Could you please give us more details about it? 

Look forward to reading your feedback.

content: what a completely fantastic retro game remake... i can remember spending so much time on this as a kid, lol its a little hard to play on a phone because i have giant hands it takes up half the screen...but the game itself is a great remake of a classic and it definately brings alot of nostalgia... so far ive only done a small portion of the game, but its a great job so far guys . 5 star job well done... üëçüëçüëç

Astonishing port. I wish this had have had the traction Zelda had, it is a wonderful little game. Top music and hand drawn graphics. In my head this is how it looked in the nineties. I absolutely commend you dotemu. If only you would convert some old spectrum 48k games next, such as the Great escape!
Love it so much I bought this on PS4 and PC, Only major gripe is playing with Bluetooth there is about 1-2 second delay in audio
Its like going back in time to my childhood . Love the new graphics and music and the gameplay stays true to the original . Great game absolutely cracking
replyContent:
Hey Tarn Forge, 

Really glad you loved the new HD graphics and music. Our main goal was to stay true and faithful to the original game. With your review, we feel like this mission is successful. Thank you very much!

content: still the same feeling but with beautiful hand draw art
replyContent:
Hey there, 

Thank you very much for your kind words. We really appreciate. 

We're glad you feel the same feeling as back in the days with the new hand-drawn graphics.

content: Update *Game constantly glitches to where the controls won't stop going to the right no matter what I do. It caused me to lose the game and have to restart it to get it to stop...* It's a great remake, but dotemu didn't make it, they're just distributing it. I love this remake, but I hate to give dotemu my money as they don't care about their customers at all. So 1 star for dotemu, and 3 stars for the remake, as it's great.
replyContent:
Hello,

We're deeply sorry to hear that you're encountering an issue with the game's control. 

Could you please tell us precisely what device do you have, what OS (and version) is it running on and what language do you use? Have you tried to uninstall and reinstall the game? Sometimes, files get corrupted during the download process.

Best Regards

content: Gorgeous remake of the old classic! Great controls + it works with Bluetooth controllers! Love, love, love!
Great with a steel series XL controller. classic game revamped for Android.
Amazing

A visual delight with solid old-school gameplay. It is amazing how well this game stood the test of time! Also, this is how every remake should be. Too bad the controls are decent at most, although they never ruined my experience of the game too much. Overall a fantastic game: another gem on the Play Store!
replyContent:
Hi Iv√°n, 

Thank you very much for your review. 

We're glad that you enjoyed Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap gameplay and graphism. 

Regarding the game controls, can you tell us exactly what bothered your experience? 

Look forward to hearing from you, 

Dotemu Team

content: OMG! Exactly the awesome same! So so fun!
Oooooohhh yeah . Exactly as it was some 30 years ago .
Amazing game... Good mobile port... nuff said.
Classic game with allot of care put into this reskin! Even with forsaken touchscreen controls, they put alot of options for catering to make it as user friendly as possible, which I applaud.
Excellent with external controller. Not so comfortable with screen controls Love the retro-modern live switching
Relive my child hood perfect

Wacky control and bars in the side of the screen because the ratio is not supported also de resolution is bad (blurred edges) I contact the developer for a refund. Developer did not even respond. Don't buy it if you are not sure is totally supported by your phone.

I have to play with the volumn off due to an extremely intense audio glitch. It comes through very loud and has a high pitch static sound. Had I been wearing headphones, I would have needed medical attn. Very disappointed I spent 4 bucks for a game I cant hear. Also I've re installed
I tried playing it but touch controls are just not responsive enough to make the game enjoyable close to the other games in the wonder boy series
This game is absolutely gorgeous. The art style is amazing, the animations adorable. It's too bad the controls are atrocious.
Controls are so terrible it's almost unplayable
It's so lagging the game and I can`t play it anymore!üò£üò£üò£

Beautiful sprites, level design and music. Controls and gameplay are just plain wrong. Every surface is like ice and that goddamn cloud just murders you and theres nothing you can do about it. Could have been the best platformer on android, you'll get fed up 2 levels in and never play again. Damn shame. Devs done goofed on this one.

I really enjoyed playing this game through. I played the original as a kid and got a lot of pleasure out of seeing the beautifully drawn artwork. I don't play games often, so thought the controls would be problematic for me, but I managed to get through and play the whole game. I would have given it 5 stars, because I actually did love playing through the game, but the game did crash pretty often. It didn't happen every time I played, but if a game session lasted longer than a half hour, it probably crashed once on me in there. I just had to close the app and restart back at the home town. I rarely lost any real progress in the game, though it would have been frustrating if it happened during a boss battle. (It didn't.)

Take notes greedy pay to play mobile scum. This is the quality product the mobile world needs to move forward and it's sad that all the great games are mostly ports hidden in a sea of Gacha trash. Even Nintendo can't resist and are using their popular Mascots for scummy cash grabs. This game is great and my rant/review is over. Also all the people giving this game bad reviews because "it's to hard for me" are absolutely ridiculous and should be banned from reviewing.
Game controls is not tight enough to make the game feel fair. Its boring and unbalanced

This is my first and only time writing a review but this game sucks. The graphics may look good and the gameplay is nice but the controls are so bad it ruins EVERYTHING. The buttons wont activate when i press them every once in a while and the graphics switch out between retro and modern every time i touch the inventory button. Overall, FIX. THE. CONTROLS!!

If you own a LG Stylo 3/Plus/4 don't pay for this game! Unexpected random crashes, A quarter of the screen displaying the master system retro graphics and the other three quarters displaying modern graphics among other bugs. Very angry. When someone calls you the game almost always has to be rebooted. What a bullsh#t thing to do to such a classic game.üòëüò†üòû

It's a trap! Avoid, avoid this game unoptimized control will lead to frustrating gameplay, difficulty doesnt scale effectively especially at first level where there is annoying cloud that trow stuff and follow's you wherever you go, purchase button in claiming the free antidote doesnt work. (sic)
a blast from the past my favourite game as a kid and buzzing that I can play it retro style aswell gonna play through it twice

Worth every gold coin i threw at this!! Loved this when i was a kid on the master system and always hoped for a remake one day. Cannot fault this at all! Great job guys 5‚òÜ from me only gripe is mouse mans bonus level just a tad too tough
Sensational game. Love it. More of this please.

Love this game, have it on SMS and every other platform these guys released it on. Runs perfectly on my Galaxy S8. I dont have any other game across this many devices, perfect rendition the the original SMS

Unplayable with touch screen, the remake itself os fantastic though. Was my favourite SMS game and I bought it on PC, this version is unplayable though as the touch controls are awful no matter how you configure them and also obscure the player sprite. Also doesn't work on my GPD XD due to not supporting older Android versions.
Beautifully remastered old classic RPG Jump'n'Run! Some glitches with erratically switching between old and new graphics on my device though...

lagging bad whether retro style or updated graphics. cannot properly play game. everything goes slow and controls are delayed response due to how slow it lags. wasted 10 bucks on this just to have an unplayable game
very nice game thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

a great reskin of the old classic game. the controls aren't bad once you're used to them and the new challenge levels are an added bonus (except for mouse mans challenge. that one is terrible). definitely worth a look.
the hand draw redo of a quality game from the 80s. hopefully they'll do wonderboy in monster land as well!

OMG THIS IS PERFECT! Controller support, one button switching to retro visuals and or music, scanlines, EVERYTHING! BUY THIS! SUPPORT THIS TYPE OF ANDROID PORT! Screw every other mobile port with their ugly iOS version 4 looking UIs, forced touch controls, broken with every android update, ports! BUY THIS INSTEAD!
Fantastic aesthetic and gameplay polish on a raw fun platformer. Its cute, fun, and chill. I needed this. Relaxing, comfortable, but always fun.
nostalgic
love the game works great super fun but needs controller support please just add controller support it'll make the game 1000 times more playable.

Purchase, download, and play it..... instant love it. The game is very similar with the Master System release with much improved & stunning visual. Another great premium game on android‚ô•(Already beat the game)
Excellent reboot of a classic master system game. All in all amazing. Shame my game achievemnts don't get logged on Android TV but I'm not sure if that is a fault on Google or the game dev.
not fun, controls suck and nit worth $10
This is exactly how you do a remake.
I simply just LOVE the graphics.
brilliant game exploring a large world and battling foes. controls are the best ive experienced on a phone game
Love this new version of the game. so faithful to what made the original great yet what a make over. So much fun, incredible graphics, love the beach music remake too.

I was really looking forward to this, unfortunately it runs like complete trash on my Nexus 5. Probably shouldn't have listed it as a compatible device? If it's something you guys can work on great, but im guessing my device simply isnt powerful enough so a refund would be greatly appreciated.
bug - cant buy free cure shot, just wont let me select it

Great on my pixel 3, runs really slow on my kids nexus 7 2013, given the graphics and logic are not that complicated, I'd expect at least 30fps on the nexus 7. Shame because the game is cool! 5 stars after optimisation on my kids device! (most kids don't have top end devices!)
it's WONDERBOYZ!!!!!
Definitely worth the money. Great new graphics and music with the option to switch to the retro ones from Game Gear.
has some issues opening up on s10 plus. soon as you click on the app the game wallpaper comes up and just hangs there. you habe to close and open thr apo back up.
did not play as wanted sneaky permission to my phone nope bye
replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you very much for purchasing Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap.

The game requires this permission only for the installation and for launching itself. We have to ask for this permission because of a bug present in an older version of Android. We do not and will not access your personal data.

Thank you for your understanding.

content: Bought it and very quickly uninstalled. Controls are glitchy and game keeps freezing.. not impressed since this isn't a cheap game.
I mean it would be awesome if it wasn't for the fact that all games played with a face pad in a touchscreen are impossible.

very nice graphics but the touch controls leave something to be desired. this ramps up the difficulty a little too much. its also a little too easy to get stuck in these inescapable situations where you bounce back and forth between enemy attacks.
incredible mobile port. the art styke is gorgeous. controls are sharp and fully customisable. its challenging yet fair. makes me think these guys could pull off a cuphead port

I have a Samsung galaxy 10 in. tablet and wow the graphics are blurry and vertical lines above all enemies and main player. I will gladly repurchase the game once a fix is released. I'll be keeping an eye out for it!

(EDITED) Great game. Changed review from 3* to 5* as I was charged twice. Now I've been refunded I feel I can only give this 5* as it stays true to the original Master System game and the new sound and graphics just make it so much better.
good job

Quality remake of a classic... Gameplay is spot on and controls are really responsive. Minor issues: 1. Really need a dedicated options button, using on S10 and find use of the soft back button really intermittent. 2. There seems to be a glitch when pressing on the inventory sometimes that it makes a slice of the screen in retro graphics, which doesn't affect gameplay but is distracting - have to open options and turn retro graphics on/off to remove.
Game wants to read and write on my storage?! Or no go? Screw that! Deleted!
replyContent:
Hello,

The game requires this permission only for the installation and for launching itself. We have to ask for this permission because of a bug present in an older version of Android. We do not and will not access your personal data.

content: played this with a dualshock 4. A great classic revamped with beautiful graphics and sound. thank you so much for porting this to Android. i would have been willing to pay three times the price. Well worth the spend. A++

This seems like a great game but it skips and lags a lot on my device and there is a weird clicking noise the whole time I'm playing even if I turn the music/sfx off. The visuals seem to adjust quality automatically and when it's at a slightly lower quality it runs a lot better but it doesn't stay there. So basically if you put in an option to adjust the visual quality manually and maybe figure out that clicking I would definitely want to repurchase this but til then, I'm out.

Great job!! Love the graphics and gameplay, brings back very good memories! I also like the retro switch between the old / new, there so much detail in the new version, thanks for breathing new life into this game! well worth the purchase.
Nice graphics, but doesn't fully support full screen mode on Galaxy Note 8. Please remove the annoying vertical bars on the left and right of the screen please.

best game, had the original on the sega master system and looked and played like the 16bit games but on an 8bit console. now with the updated graphics and sound its portable and at a great price. good job dotemu

This game is fantastic. I had the original MS version, one of my favourite games as a kid, and this remake is outstanding. The art style is perfect and the music recordings are incredible versions of the originals. Touch screen controls can often let down mobile games, but the fact that this game relies on simple platforming and combat controls means button frustration is rarely an issue. The developers were obviously fans of the original and have done this classic absolute justice!

Third time buying the game. A remake with heart and soul to one of the most iconic games of all time. Took a while to get used to the screen controls as the buttons are a little too small but plays just like the modern console versions I've put over 50 hours into.
This is how you make a game! runs great on my chromebook with a joypad
Loved playing this game on Steam and it's just as good. I wouldn't have gotten this without controller support so good on them for adding it for the mobile version.

A relatively short Metroidvania style game with a beautiful art style, fantastic music and is also a very good mobile port. Fully customisable touch screen controls, both location and size, although perfectly playable with the default options. Would still recommend using a controller if you have one available, but the game is straight forward enough that you can easily beat the normal and easy difficulties without.
Love this game, but experienced graphical hitching and sound delay on my Galaxy S7. Will happily repurchase if it gets fixed.
amazing! plays exactly like PS4 version.. price too steep for me as alresdy got PS4 version which is exacrly the same.. amazing game!
Love this game!
Terrific port of a classic game.
This has always been one of my favorite games! This is wonderful!
A fun and amazing remake of a timeless game üëç
